channel.title: Films on Susan Potter
channel.description: Recent content in Films on Susan Potter

item.title: Shorts
item.description: My absolute favorite format of film is the short film. Here are a list of short films I loved watching: Re-Gifted (2018): CGI 3D short film that follows the life of a decrative ornament. 3x3 (2009): A tale of two different approaches to mastery. The Bigger Picture (2015): Two brothers struggling to cope with their elderly mother's care. Round About Five (2005): A bicycle courier and a businessman share a fleeeting moment during a London rush hour.
